title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 948/1999 of 5 May 1999 prohibiting fishing for blue whiting by vessels flying the flag of a Member State except Germany and Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 948/1999
of 5 May 1999
prohibiting fishing for blue whiting by vessels flying the flag of a Member State except Germany and Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of blue whiting in the waters of ICES divisions V b (EC zone), VI, VII by vessels flying the flag of a Member State except Germany and Spain or registered in a Member State except Germany and Spain are hereby deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to the Member States except Germany and Spain for 1999.
Fishing for blue whiting in the waters of ICES divisions V b (EC zone), VI, VII by vessels flying the flag of Member State except Germany and Spain or registered in a Member State except Germany and Spain shall be prohibited, as also the retention on board, transhipment and landing of fish from this stock caught by the above vessels after the date of entry into force of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
